pre_caption: This is a static, scenic aerial shot of a city nestled in a valley at sunset. A long, straight road runs through the center of the city, leading toward a range of mountains in the distance. The setting sun peeks over the mountains, casting a warm, hazy, orange glow over the entire landscape.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
